thread.section_title: ClearBags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ClearBags | clearbags.com | 5 of 472
thread.title: thomas

author: thomas
title: thomas
text: My lone criticism is that when I mounted my pictures to their precut matting boards, and then placed their pre cut mattes on the mounts, they weren't always square with each other. One corner of the matte or the mount would be a little low or a little rounded over. I assume these are cut by machine, and I expected uniformity. I realize that those edges will be covered in the frame, but that 32nd of an inch kept me from giving the full 5 stars. I will definitely continue to use their products and will recommend them.
